body: Ao, The Run Energy simulation component is currently deprecated and you should be using the OpenStudio component. I have not been able to create your issue on the OpenStudio component.  I only get one availability schedule when I use the following: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/VGRtukE3--bYvuTNAZybTvHsk-q*pBwapkNk5IG65Jl1nXaWwkgpQ0kbcYz1f9Qm0V5Ujbx79hbd6bilkuL2rVSvnakVSXrz/OneSched.JPG) -Chris
